it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.player

Class BonusBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.player.BonusBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BonusBar
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that represents the bonus bars the player can have. This bonus bars give to the player a bonus when he does a product or an yield action
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • BonusBar

        public BonusBar(Effect productBonus,
                Effect yieldBonus,
                java.lang.String name)
        Constructor of the bonus bar
        Parameters:
        productBonus - The effect to enable when the player does a product action
        yieldBonus - The effect to enable when the player does a yield action
        name - The name of the bonus bar to load it from a file

      • BonusBar

        public BonusBar()
        Simple BonusBar for the game. Is the same for all the player
